name: Can't Escape the Past
description:
A wacky 3D platformer proof-of-concept where you are physically tethered to the ghost of your past... from 3 seconds ago. Try to stray too far, and you are yanked back with the force of physics. Can you work with your past in order to get to the goal?

Team Lead/Game Design/Coding: Lillian Goulston

3D Modeling: Hedrison from LuckRon Games

Misc. 3D Assets: XV and Yuffels

Resource Manager: Beka Pham

Music: Rainbows by Kevin MacLeod

NOTE: If the main build fails to run, try the backup build. Unfortunately, the tether is invisible in the backup build for development reasons, so make sure to try the main build first.
